main event: A bright comet-like object was sighted flashing across the sky in Pound Ridge, Connecticut on December 14, 1962.
interesting points: The object exhibited a brilliant flash of blue, green, and yellowish light,The sighting lasted about 10 seconds, although one report mentions a total duration of approximately 20 seconds, It was initially reported to be cylindrical and moving at high speed, Two separate observers confirmed the sighting, The conclusion drawn was that it was probably a meteor.
